PageDescription: Submit request to become an ONLYOFFICE partner.
FillInTheDetailsBelow: Fill in the details below, and we will be in touch
PleaseListYourTargetMarketSegments: Please list your target market segments*
AreYouCurrentlyAPartnerOrAgent: Are you currently a partner or agent for any other company the offers solutions similar to ONLYOFFICE? If yes, please specify one or more partners
DoYouHaveExistingSalesOpportunities: Do you have existing sales opportunities for ONLYOFFICE solutions?
WouldYouNeedADemoPortal: Would you need a demo portal to showcase ONLYOFFICE to your prospects?
DoYouNeedAProductTraining: Do you need a product training offered by ONLYOFFICE?
DoYouNeedASalesTraining: Do you need a sales training on ONLYOFFICE products?
HowAreYouGoingToPromote: How are you going to promote ONLYOFFICE for your market segments?
WhereHaveYouFirstHeardAboutUs: Where have you first heard about us?
PleaseIncludeAnyAdditionalInformation: Please include any additional information you think would assist our team to process your application:
IWantToSubscribeToTheOONewsletter: I want to subscribe to the ONLYOFFICE newsletter
ByClickingSubmitRequest: By clicking Submit request you understand and agree to our <0>Privacy statement</0>.
OurManagerWillContactYou: Our manager will contact you during the next 24 hours.
